column1: Management scenario: Typical private land activities

column2: Likely to keep losing species under a dense olive canopy as diversity changes from graminoid form towards broadleaf forms of plants that are more shade tolerant
Removal of olives tends to result in an immediate diversity response (increased light, germination from soil seedbank) and then more taxa immigrate from refugia nearby over time
Likely to have a diverse planting initially and then later immigration of other taxa from refugia
